directions: [["Wash and grate the zucchini (skins on and stem removed). Sprinkle with salt and transfer to a clean dish towel. Squeeze out the liquid by hand. Remove as much moisture out as possible for a crunchier fritter."],["Combine Base ingredients in a large bowl and mix together. "],["Add the Cheese Mix ingredients and mix until well combined."],["Gently mix in the flour, careful not to overwork the mixture. Add more flour if the mixture looks too moist."],["Heat a large frying pan to medium high heat and add 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Scoop a spoonful of the mixture and add to the pan. Press down on the patty lightly to flatten. Repeat the process until the pan is full, being careful not to overcrowd the pan. "],["Pan fry for 3 minutes, and then flip with a spatula. Both sides should be golden brown. Transfer to a cooling rack, or a plate lined with paper towels to drain excess oils."],["Repeat until all of the mixture is used and serve warm"],[""],[""],[""]]
ingredients: [{"number":["1"],"units":["Pound(s)"],"name":["Grated zucchini"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["3"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Green onions, thinly sliced"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["1/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Dill, finely chopped"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["1/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Mint, finely chopped"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Teaspoon(s)"],"name":["Chili flakes"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Pinch(es)"],"name":["Salt and pepper, to taste"],"category":["Base"]},{"number":["1"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Feta cheese, crumbled"],"category":["Cheese Mix"]},{"number":["1/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["Parmesan cheese, grated"],"category":["Cheese Mix"]},{"number":["3"],"units":["Whole"],"name":["Eggs"],"category":["Cheese Mix"]},{"number":["3/4"],"units":["Cup(s)"],"name":["All-purpose flour"],"category":["Dry"]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]},{"number":[""],"units":[""],"name":[""],"category":[""]}]
